channel.title: Screen Clipping/Stuttering
channel.description: So far, I am definitely impressed with this re-mastering of Half-Life. And seeing that it is an early access game I kind of expected it to be a bit buggy. The only issue I've run into so far however is the display is almost constantly clipping/flickering. I have anti-aliasing turned all the way up with "wait for vertical sync" enabled. I don't know if anyone else is experiencingn this or not. I'm not noticing any lag or anything like that. Just the picture stutters.

item.title: Screen Clipping/Stuttering
item.dc:creator: Xilefian
item.description:
breginor1:

So far, I am definitely impressed with this re-mastering of Half-Life. And seeing that it is an early access game I kind of expected it to be a bit buggy. The only issue I’ve run into so far however is the display is almost constantly clipping/flickering. I have anti-aliasing turned all the way up with “wait for vertical sync” enabled. I don’t know if anyone else is experiencingn this or not. I’m not noticing any lag or anything like that. Just the picture stutters.

“Clipping” is probably the wrong word as clipping generally refers to when geometry intersects.

What do you mean by ‘clipping’ and ‘flickering’? Does the image flash every now and then or does it wobbly strangely? Could you tell us your computer’s specifications?
